name: Expedition
description: A major progression project where Raiders depart the Rust Belt. Prepare over a 60-day period, then depart during a 7-day window. Workshop resets but blueprints, maps, and cosmetics carry over.
rewards: Up to 5 skill points (based on stash value)

stages.name: Foundation
stages.description: Building the base structure and frame of the caravan

stages.name: Core Systems
stages.description: Connecting wiring, ventilation, and essential power systems

stages.name: Framework
stages.description: Building walls and roof, installing core systems, and defining the interior layout

stages.name: Outfitting
stages.description: Adding storage, workbenches, utilities, and personal touches

stages.name: Load Stage
stages.description: Preparing supplies for departure. Contribute items to earn skill points based on total value (1 point per 1,000,000 value, max 5 points).
stages.note: Contribute any items - skill points earned based on total value contributed
